Description: This evening gown is perfect for the woman looking for a sleek sexy night. Illusion bodice with sparkling bead details the sheer neckline created a faux necklace effect.  The sheer back with cut away adds to the stylish sex appeal.The beading and sparkle continue down to the slightly flare skirt for slimming effect.
